exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-muon-pileup-merge.root -p 13 -b Test_bin.dat

exeName TIDArun.sh
exeParamString data-muon-pileup-merge.root data-mu_Zmumu_pu40-reference.root HLT_mu24_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF HLT_mu24_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Muon_0 HLT_mu24_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Muon_2 -d HLTL2-plots

exeName TIDArun.sh
exeParamString data-muon-pileup-merge.root data-mu_Zmumu_pu40-reference.root HLT_mu24_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF HLT_mu24_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_IDTrig HLT_mu24_L2Star_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_EFID -d HLTEF-plots
